# decisions(in:)

**Instance Method**

All decisions within the given time range.

## Declaration

```swift
final func decisions(in timeRange: CMTimeRange) -> [CNDecision]
```

## Parameters

- **timeRange**: The time range of the decision.

## Return Value

An array of decisions within the given time range.
